If you enjoy getting matched against players who have 10 times more or 10 times less hours into the game than you, go ahead... Despite having a healthy population, this game's matchmaking system is absolute garbage and gets worse every time devs try to enhance it.

hafa allar flestar konur kvendýr eðlis þörf fyrir að makast með hverjum sem er sem er nógu góður en karlaveldið um aldir reynt að ná stjórn á þeim með trúarreglum og samfélagshefðum og fordæmingu á lauslæti sem var reyndar banvænt vegna kynsjúkdóma. en væri hægt að gera á öruggan máta, td nota bara hendur og þvo þær svo . ættum við að bera virðingu fyrir náttúrlegu eðli , virðum hórueðlið, það er til staðar af ástæðu sem er sú að það gagnaðist okkur sem dýrategund stuðlaði að fjölgun,  ættum við þá að tilbiðja hórueðlið setja það á guðdómlegan stall eins og móðureðlið , auðvitað, og hvetja sem flestar til að handfróa sem flestum.

Dead by Daylight has always been one of those games that has had an identity crisis with what it wants to do with itself, like them changing the HUD for whatever reason or making killers just awful, or making them too good, or adding SBMM (Skill Based Matchmaking), but the game as a whole is honestly pretty fun if you like getting either slaughtered by a killer, or being the killer himself. There are many DLCs to buy, but don't let that deter you from this game, cause it is a really worthwhile experience you'll want to keep coming back to, and you only have to buy the characters you realistically want. Or you can just go all in and buy the Ultimate Edition to get everything at a more discounted price (Apart from any licensed characters and chapters like Resident Evil and Leatherface). But yeah, my verdict is if you like the setting and the gameplay of going around and repairing generators while avoiding the killer, or even being the killer and preventing them from doing that very thing, definitely buy it for sure. Also don't let the playtime deceive you, my PC is just not very good so I play on both Switch and PS4 for now.

Если в краце, то игра шлак полная. А если по подробнее, то есть тут два типа убийц: ближний бой и дальний бой. Это полный пи**ец, есть даже убийца с ружьем.
